{{also|sommer|sømmer|sòmmer}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|sumer}}, from {{inh|de|goh|sumar}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*sumaraz}}. The expected modern form is {{m|de||Summer}}, as indeed found in most southern dialects. The vocalism ''-o-'' is of [[Central German|Central]] and [[Low German]] origin (compare {{cog|gml|somer|som[m]er}}).
